description: ZFS metrics as extracted by node_exporter

targets.expr:
# seems like in ZFS arc_sys_free targets MemFree, without accounting for Buffers and Cached
max(avg_over_time(node_memory_MemFree_bytes{instance="$instance"}[$__interval]))

options.content:
- `data` and `meta`: data is already in ARC
- `L2`: data is already in L2ARC
- `zfetch`: data access is predictable
- `adaptive prefetch`: data is prefetched using heuristic
- `prescient prefetch`: data is prefetched withtout heuristics
- - prescient prefetch is rarely used (so it has 0% hit rate in graph) but hit rate is usually 100%

panels.description: When there is no demand, result value will be 0%
panels.title: ARC hit %

title: ZFS ARC Statistics
